ModMetaData.name: World Map Beautification Project - for Realistic Planets
ModMetaData.author: Carolusclen
ModMetaData.description:
[h1] Realistic Planets Addon [/h1] This is a DLC for the mod "World Map Beautification Project" by Odeum.
The DLC adds support for the "Realistic Planets" mod
[h1] Features [/h1] [b]Grassland[/b] - Grasslands, as the name suggests, are areas where the vegetation is dominated by grasses and shrubs. [list] [*] Rolling Mountains [*] Lush greenery [/list] [b]Savana[/b] - Savannas are mixed woodland/grassland ecosystems typically found between rainforests and deserts. [list] [*] Dry grasslands [*] Dusty Mountains [/list] [b]Steppes[/b] - Steppes are high-altitude grassland regions. [list] [*] Cold and dry grasslands [*] Mountains just as beautiful [/list] [b]Temperate Deserts[/b] - Temperate deserts are cooler but often even drier than subtropical deserts. [list] [*] Dry grasslands with a chill in the wind [*] Dead mountains that howl in the cold wind [/list] [b]Permafrost[/b] - Permafrost exists on the border between tundra and ice sheets. [list] [*] Mind your step on the mountains [*] Is that a single shrub, lonely! [/list] [b]Oasis[/b] - Oases are vibrant, isolated bits of life and color. [list] [*] Is that a mirage [/list]
